snippet.title: I Made Snake With 30,000 Players
snippet.description:
I challenged myself to make a game using Twitter's Bot API. I ended up creating a clone of Snake, an arcade game where navigate around your tail to eat apples, that is played entirely through Twitter with likes and retweets! Every 30 minutes, the bot checks the amount of likes and retweets on the latest tweet, and turns the snake clockwise or counterclockwise based on which count is higher.

Check out Twitter Plays Snake here: https://twitter.com/SnakeGameBot
→ Join the PolySpace Discord: https://discord.gg/sGecnxuwxu

---Chapters---

0:00 Intro
0:48 Core
2:19 Twitter Bot Basics
3:07 Snake Basics
3:56 Finishing Snake
5:33 Improving the Bot
5:56 Running the Bot
6:12 The Snake Community
6:52 Conclusion

---Resources/libraries used---

Twitter4J
http://twitter4j.org/en/

How To Make a Scary Russian Twitter Bot With Java - Martin Erlic
https://medium.com/@SeloSlav/how-to-make-a-scary-russian-twitter-bot-with-java-b7b62768a3ac

Snake fancam - @c00kiecache
https://twitter.com/c00kiecache/status/1326250132480921601

---Music---

"Street Brawlin'" - Adam Haynes (https://youtu.be/AMAVd3e7lXc)
"Rocket" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Wallpaper" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Cyborg Ninja" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Getting it Done" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"EDM Detection Mode" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Amazing Plan" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Robobozo" - Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com)
"Operatic 3" - Vibe Mountain (https://youtu.be/v8UtWLngE1s)

https://youtu.be/hBP-NzOadL0

https://youtu.be/rICunDRc_WM

https://youtu.be/K0X5A6aURms

https://youtu.be/K0X5A6aURms

https://youtu.be/AGnMNor_r-Y

https://youtu.be/EAMHQfCGymg

https://youtu.be/mE6_A1hRcQk
